name: Stout Halfling Guard
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: The Stout Halfling Guard is a small humanoid wearing solid armor, equipped with a spear for combat.
memorable: It has a notable passive perception of 14, allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
goals: To serve as a basic defensive unit, protecting key areas or assets.
relations: May be encountered with other guards or small humanoid creatures.
environment: Typically found in settlements or areas requiring defense.
strengths: Good at noticing hidden objects and threats due to high passive perception.
weaknesses: Lacks high damage output or exceptional combat abilities.
attacks: Uses a spear for melee or ranged attacks, dealing 3 piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Notable perception skills for detecting hidden entities.
equipment: Carries a spear as its primary weapon.
senses: It has a passive perception score of 14, indicating a strong ability to notice hidden entities or traps.
skills: Proficient in perception, insight, and nature, each with a bonus of +2.
additional_information: Has an average Strength score of 10.
Possesses basic combat abilities suitable for a defensive role.
Relatively low hit points, making it vulnerable.
Can communicate in one language of its choice.
Functions well as a support character in a group.
